data.name: Zombieville USA 3D
data.detailed_description:
Zombieville USA 3-D is a light-hearted action romp. It's one part looter-shooter, one part rogue-lite, and one part ravenous brain-eating monster. Kill hordes of zombies, unlock new weapons, level up your character with skills and specializations, and see how long you can survive!

Features
  • A huge arsenal of weapons, from machine guns and shotguns, to chainsaws, rockets, flamethrowers, and katanas. You name it, we probably got it.
  • A variety of player skills to customize your playstyle. Specialize in melee weapons, explosives, whatever floats your boat.
  • Randomly generated weapons, infinitely scaling difficulty.
  • Spectacular stylized 3D visuals.
  • Up to 4 player online co-op.
  • ...and more! Probably... we'll see when it's done.

Follow us on Twitter @MikaMobile to stay up to date on all developments.

data.short_description: Welcome back to Zombieville, where arcade survival action and hilarious stylized visuals combine to eat your brains! Choose your weapons, grab a friend, and blast your way through the endless hordes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 Sp1
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Q6867
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game features large amounts of cartoon violence.
